Description:
A North-Facing Corner Delight!
Venture down the pathway of future success with this rewarding three-bedroom home, which stands on a coveted 630sqm (approx.) corner block shining brightly with opportunity and a desirable Northerly aspect.
That opportunity presents itself in the form of development, given the scope to build a collection of contemporary units with their own frontages (STCA). Of course, theres also the option of retaining the neat and tidy single-level home and renovating it into your ultra-modern family residence.
Perfectly liveable, you could also line your pockets with income by leasing the home whilst plans and permits are being approved.
Just when you think it cant get any better, it does when you factor in the sought-after location thats only a short stroll to Namatjira Reserve and just minutes away from Clayton train station, Clayton Community Centre, Clayton shops and local schools.

Description:
SOLD!
3 BEDROOM HOME + 1 BEDROOM UNIT
This great home and location is ideal for the large or extended family, offering a self-contained unit, or perfect for the owner occupier and astute investor, opening up an avenue for great rental.
The front brick veneer home with a family friendly floor plan features two living areas, 3 good-sized bedrooms with robes, bathroom with spa and shower and an updated kitchen and laundry and evaporative cooling throughout. The self-contained unit offers a veranda, kitchen/lounge/dining, bedroom with en-suite and air-conditioning/heating.
Situated opposite Clayton South Primary School and Park, buses and all major amenities, this is a fantastic chance to acquire a family friendly property, or a great rental investment allowing for two rental incomes.

Description:
A SUPER NEAT & TIDY HOME IN A GREAT LOCATION
In great condition and in a great location, this home looks beautiful after a host of recent updates and is ready for a new family to start building memories or a savvy investor looking to capitalize. Fronted by a high brick fence for added privacy and security, the home is fronted by a pristine red brick facade with a double carport and roller shutters on most windows giving added security and heat suppression during the summer months. Inside, crisp white paint and floating floors set the scene with features including a generous lounge/dining room with gas heater plus a stunning renovated kitchen with stone benches and a porcelain tiled meals area. There are 3 bedrooms that all feature built in wardrobes as well as a renovated bathroom tiled from floor to ceiling in porcelain. Outside there's also a garage with additional work/storage space in the backyard that also features a covered entertaining patio, vegie patch and the bonus of a hand built wood fired pizza oven. The location seals the deal with Clarinda Shopping Centre, St Andrews Catholic School, buses and Namatjira Park all within walking distance.
Insights: 103 Springs Road, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2017 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Sensational Low-Maintenance Living In Ultra-Convenient Locale
Stylishly appointed and wonderfully low-maintenance, this contemporary double storey 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home is part of a quiet cul-de-sac a stroll to Westall train station and minutes to Westall Primary and Secondary and a short bus ride to Monash University. A spacious, open design incorporates a light-filled living/meals area and modern galley-style stone kitchen, effortlessly spilling out to a sunny entertaining courtyard. An ideal opportunity for the first home buyer, young family, student or savvy investor, complete with ducted heating, split system AC, powder room, water tank and DLUG.
*Please Note* Buxton Real Estate may refuse to provide further information about the property should you prefer not to disclose your Full Contact Details including Phone Number. Photo id required upon entering the property.

Description:
The Development Of A Lifetime On 697 SQM Approx!
Attention builders, investors and developers! Positioned excellently from an investment perspective, this ideally located allotment with the potential to construct multi-unit townhouses (S.T.C.A). The homes are situated in close proximity to the Westall Train Station, Westall Secondary College, local shopping strip, Clayton Train Station, and only minutes away from Monash University and Monash Medical Centre.
Features: With a frontage of 15.24m approx. for a potential multi-unit townhouse development, this property would be your best investment of the year! Spacious bedrooms, central bathroom, spacious kitchen, large living area, separate laundry area, lock-up garage, all set on a massive block of land of 697sqm approx.
Keep the house and build in the back or demolish and build multiple townhouses!(S.T.C.A.)

Description:
Exceptional Value
You'll find great value in this quiet and secluded stand alone unit with no shared driveway and body corp to worry about.
Comprising 3 good sized bedrooms with built in robes, separate lounge, large modern kitchen with gas appliances, separate meals area, renovated central bathroom, polished hardwood floors, alarm system, gas ducted heating, airconditioner, double remote controlled lock up garage and a long driveway for extra car accommodations.
Positioned minutes walk to Westall Primary and Secondary Schools, train station and easy access to Clayton and Springvale Shopping Centre, Monash Hospital, Westall Road bypass and other amenities. Your location is not only convenient, but easily tenantable with a possible rent between $380-$400 per week - a key factor for the wise investor.
A keen eye and a bit of personal touch will make this well situated unit a great first home or viable investment property. Make it yours.
Call today to arrange your inspection.

Description:
LARGE FAMILY HOME IN A QUIET COURT POSITION
Specially built for the family back in 1978, this home has remained in the same hands until this day with nothing but love and care shown throughout its life, it remains in beautiful condition today. But alas, it is time for another generation to take up the mantle by making it their own to start creating their own memories. In the bowl of a court quietly positioned close to Namatjira Park, buses, Clarinda Shopping Centre and local schools, a great location is only the start of the story. Fronted by a classic brick façade and lush front garden, you step inside and find a spacious feeling home with 2.7m ceilings and lashings of timber to complement features including a generous lounge room, tiled dining area and a pristine fully equipped kitchen. There are 4 bedrooms and 2 immaculate bathrooms including an ensuite accessible by 2 of the bedrooms plus the added comforts of ducted heating and a large split system air conditioner. Outside you find a double garage with roll through access to the backyard with sunlit and shaded areas, a garden shed and a huge covered patio that can be used all year 'round.
Insights: 4 Snowy Court, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2017 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
2/5 Hayden Road, Clayton South Vic 3169
Located in the best location walking distance to Heatherton park, Spring Parks Primary school, Springvale plaza, one bus line to Monash University, 5-minute drive to Killester college, Westall College, Springvale shopping centre, and many more facilities; These brilliant 1-year-old townhouses features:
Downstairs with:
- Spacious open living area; high ceiling 2.7m
- Portland tiling throughout 600mm x 600mm

Description:
Near New Beauty in Great Location
This modern and stylish 2 bedroom unit can easily be converted to 3 bedrooms if required. Westall Train Station, Public transport, local shops, Westall Secondary College and Primary School are all conveniently located within walking distance, whereas Clayton Shopping Centre, Monash Hospital and Monash University are only minutes' drive away.
Featuring very large lounge room with open plan kitchen and meals area. Designer kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances including dishwasher will impress the fussiest buyers, 2 good sized bedrooms with built in robes and good quality carpets, while all living, kitchen and bathroom have beautiful ceramic tiles which create a great modern look. Family bathroom with a bathtub and separate shower is complimented by a powder room with second toilet.
The property has a good size back yard, single garage plus another car space, ducted heating and air conditioning. Fantastic for first home buyers or investor. For more information call Rene on 0413 330 357.

Secure this property now and enjoy what it offers.

Description:
A SURPRISINGLY SPACIOUS UNIT IN A VERY HANDY POSITION
Tucked neatly at the rear of a well maintained block this unit offers plenty for first home buyers and investors with a low maintenance nature and great potential to update and add extra value. Surprisingly spacious, it features a vast living/dining area and a separate kitchen with a freestanding electric oven/stove. There are 2 bedrooms with built in wardrobes plus a bathroom with separate toilet and a full laundry. Extras include a gas heater, a car space and a courtyard that is both private and easy to maintain. Well positioned with buses out the front, the home is within minutes of Clarinda Shopping Centre as well as central Clayton's shops, cafes and train station.

Description:
AFFORDABILITY, SPACE & POSITION
A large and spacious very private 5 bedroom family home in a quiet court position on 735sqm (approx.). In excellent condition with potential for its new owner to update and personalize it to really make it their own. From the street it doesn't give much away with just a double garage and double carport visible from the kerb but onside inside you are blown away by its sheer size with space, light and accommodation to suit a large family. Living options are generous with a formal lounge and dining room incorporating a large wet bar and there's also family and meals areas separated by a big and pristine kitchen. There are no less than 5 bedrooms here too including the master with its own ensuite to match the neat original bathroom. There's also a study, an air conditioner while outside you find a yard with sunny northern aspect that is both spacious and easily maintained. Right near Namatjira Park, bused and St Andrews Primary School the home is also within minutes of Clarinda Shopping Centre and all the amenities of central Clayton.

Description:
Stamped, Approved And Ready To Build!
As a developer, you understand the ?time is money? saying well. So when you have a chance to skip the queue and secure a property that already boasts approved plans and permits for five Townhouses just as this property does, you know you?ll have to move quickly to secure this first-class development opportunity.
Complete with stamped plans and engineering, you?re therefore free to begin building the instant the keys to this exciting property are in your hand.
Offering a mix of single-level and two-storey three-bedroom town residences, your future development will also enjoy outstanding access to Westall and Clayton train stations, Monash University Clayton Campus, Monash Medical Centre, Chadstone Shopping Centre and the Monash Freeway.

Description:
Feels Like Home, A Clever Buy in Clarevale!
The moment you step in this lovingly cared for property, you will feel like you have arrived home. It's a special feeling that only properties of this calibre, warmth and character can offer.
Move straight in or rent straight out. Or for those looking to add further value, it can be updated for a more modern feel or build another unit at the rear (STCA).
Situated within a comfortable and leisurely walk to all of Clayton Central amenities. With easy access to all public transport and minutes to Chadstone Shopping Centre/Springvale Shopping Centre and Moorabbin DFO/Costco.
In a house proud street with Keely Park nearby and walking distance to local primary/secondary/Chinese Schools. Offering a great family environment that will ensure this property will continue to grow in value and desirability.
ABOUT THE HOME
3 large Bedrooms
Beautiful Original Polished Floorboards
Updated Kitchen
Large Beautiful Backyard/Lovely Gorgeous front yard
In excellent condition
Potential Dual Occupancy Site (STCA)
Landsize 15.6M X 42M (655m2 land)

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
STUNNING DESIGN WITHIN EASY ACCESS TO CLAYTON CENTRAL
Quality, Style and Great Location within minutes' walk to Clayton Central.
This Brand new townhouse has it all. Ideal family living with 3 generous bedrooms, master with ensuite, spacious open plan living areas, fantastic and fully equipped kitchen and a rap around private and landscaped courtyard ideal for family get-togethers.
There is a range of extras including internal access from the remote controlled garage, tiled bathrooms with floor to ceiling porcelain tiles, LED lights, stone bench tops and Ilve appliances.
An inspection will certainly impress.
PRIOR OFFERS INVITED!

Description:
AFFORDABLE, CHARMING & INVITING!
On a generous yet manageable block the home is fronted by low brick fence that matches its classic brick facade and inside you find polished hardwood floors complementing the crisp off white paintwork perfectly. It features a vast lounge/dining room as well as an adjoining kitchen renovated with a stainless steel oven and cook top. There are 3 bedrooms and a modern bathroom with dual access toilet plus the added comforts of a gas wall heater and evaporative cooling. Outside, a long driveway leads to the single garage and the backyard is highlighted by a broad covered patio and a cubby house for the kids. Just minutes away from buses, Clayton South Primary School and Clarinda Shopping Centre, a great location only adds to its appeal.
